function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High stability of SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV-1 in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of the viruses in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, ventilation of indoor spaces","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation, air purifiers with HEPA filters","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, healthcare workers, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
